archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.7.3c: c) specialised services and tools offered by cyber insurance providers (e.g. 24/7 cyber claims hotline, online resource portal, security ratings, benchmark reporting and cyber maturity assessments)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
